title: On the Equality of Three Formulas for Brumer--Stark Units. (arXiv:2211.01715v1 [math.NT])
description: We prove the equality of three conjectural formulas for the Brumer--Stark units. The first formula has essentially been proven, so the present paper also verifies the validity of the other two formulas.
dc:creator: Samit Dasgupta, Matthew H. Honnor
